General.Name: Sijin Intelligent Forming Machinery
General.Description: Sijin Intelligent Forming Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of multi-station high-speed automatic cold forming equipment and die casting equipment in China. The company provides cold forging machines, special part and nut formers, nut-former machines, thread rolling machines, one die two blow headers, and die casting machines. Sijin Intelligent Forming Machinery Co., Ltd. is based in Ningbo, China.
